adrFormatAddress: 200 E 24th St Suite 101, New York, NY 10010, USA

originalText.text: Dr. Sudacov is wonderful. Very attentive and accommodating. A lot of office visits in NYC can feel very cold and transactional, but Vlad makes his patients feel comfortable and that he actually cares about their individual health. Makes you look forward to going to the dentist.

text.text: Dr. Sudacov is wonderful. Very attentive and accommodating. A lot of office visits in NYC can feel very cold and transactional, but Vlad makes his patients feel comfortable and that he actually cares about their individual health. Makes you look forward to going to the dentist.

originalText.text: I was visiting NYC and had a veneer pop off my front tooth.  Luckily I found Dr Sudacov and his wonderful team who saw me on the weekend and saved the day. Highly recommend as it’s hard these days to find a doc that’s personable and will go the extra mile. Thanks again!

text.text: I was visiting NYC and had a veneer pop off my front tooth.  Luckily I found Dr Sudacov and his wonderful team who saw me on the weekend and saved the day. Highly recommend as it’s hard these days to find a doc that’s personable and will go the extra mile. Thanks again!

originalText.text: After a traumatic experience with a dentist in Miami, I was afraid to seek appropriate care for my teeth. A friend recommended Dr. Vlad Sudacov and I am so happy I took his advice. Dr Sudacov has been the best dentist I’ve ever had. He attended to me with the utmost care and concern and despite my dental issues, I felt minimal pain as his patient. He explained my issues in a way that helped me understand the treatment plan and I felt at ease while he attended to me. I highly recommend him, particularly for anyone who may have a fear of dentists.

text.text: After a traumatic experience with a dentist in Miami, I was afraid to seek appropriate care for my teeth. A friend recommended Dr. Vlad Sudacov and I am so happy I took his advice. originalText.text:
Been seeing doc Sudacov for the past 4 years. Couldn't ask for a better dentist. Caring, patient and professional.

He takes care of my family and I refer friends for the great service.

Don't hesitate to book him up
